channel.title: Firemaking Help 317 [PI]
channel.description: When I try firemaking on my server, every log gives 1.5k exp. I figured that this would be in firemaking.java, but i wasnt sure. Someone help please?

item.title: Firemaking Help 317 [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

beale:

c.getPA().addSkillXP(logs[slot] * Config.FIREMAKING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerFiremaking);

There’s the specific line.

Now how it’s adding exp is simple. It takes an index from the logs array:

As you can see, they’re all 1500 or greater. Don’t change these, though, as they’re the IDs of logs.

And then it multiplies them by whatever the value of “FIREMAKING_EXPERIENCE” is in your Config.java

I recommend you change the:

beale:

logs[slot] * Config.FIREMAKING_EXPERIENCE

To:

And then modifying the values in the exp array:

Read full topic

item.title: Firemaking Help 317 [PI]
item.dc:creator: @beale beale
item.description:
@beale wrote:

[code] package server.model.players.skills;

import server.Config;
import server.model.players.Client;
import server.model.objects.Objects;
import server.Server;
/**

  • Firemaking.java
  • @author Sanity

**/
@SuppressWarnings(“unused”)
public class Firemaking {

private Client c;

private int[] logs = {1511,1521,1519,1517,1515,1513};
private int[] exp = {1,3,4,5,7,8};
private int[] level = {1,15,30,45,60,75};
public long lastLight;
private int DELAY = 1250;
public boolean resetAnim = true;

public Firemaking(Client c) {
	this.c = c;
}

public void checkLogType(int logType, int otherItem) {
	for (int j = 0; j < logs.length;j++) {
		if (logs[j] == logType || logs[j] == otherItem) {
			lightFire(j);
			return;
		}
	}	
}

public void lightFire(int slot) {
	if (c.duelStatus >= 5) {
		c.sendMessage("Why am I trying to light a fire in the duel arena?");
		return;
	}	
	if (c.playerLevel[c.playerFiremaking] >= level[slot]) {
		if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(590) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(logs[slot])) {
			if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastLight > DELAY) {
				c.startAnimation(733,0);
				c.getItems().deleteItem(logs[slot], c.getItems().getItemSlot(logs[slot]), 1);
				c.getPA().addSkillXP(logs[slot] * Config.FIREMAKING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerFiremaking);
				Objects fire = new Objects(2732,c.getX(),c.getY(), 0, -1, 10, 3);
				Objects fire2 = new Objects(-1,c.getX(),c.getY(), 0, -1, 10, 60);
				c.sendMessage("You light the fire.");
				this.lastLight = System.currentTimeMillis();
				//c.getPA().frame1();
				resetAnim = true;
			}
		}
	}	
}

} [/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Firemaking Help 317 [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I’m pretty sure this is in Firemaking.java

search for the text “addSkillXP”

If you need more guidance post the contents of the Firemaking.java using [ code] brackets [/ code] (no spaces between the [ ]). If the file is 20k characters or more, put it on a website like http://pastebin.org
